Rayakan Hari Jadi ke-25, Gigi Rilis Box Set
03 Nov 2019, 05:07 by Windy Eka Pramudya
UNTUK merayakan hari jadi ke-25, Gigi memberikan kado istimewa untuk para Gigikita, sebutan penggemar Gigi, Pada Sabtu, 2 November 2019. Gigi meluncurkan box set ekslusif sebagai bentuk perayaan ulang tahun mereka. Box set yang terdiri atas empat keping puzzle ini mewakili kisah empat personel Gigi, yaitu Armand Maulana (vokal), Dewa Budjana (gitar), Gusti Hendy (drum), dan Thomas Ramdhan (bas).
Box set ekslusif ini berisi memorabilia para personel Gigi. Setiap box set berisi kaus, DVD dokumenter yang berkisah tentang keseharian personel dalam judul A Day With, buku harian yang ditulis tangan para personel, serta kartu anggota Gigikita edisi setiap personel. Selain benda memorabilia Armand dkk, box set juga diisi mini album terbaru Gigi berjudul Silver dalam format kaset, kartu anggota 25 tahun Gigi, 10 kartu pos bergambar foto perjalanan 25 tahun Gigi, dan sertifikat kepemilikan box set.
Uniknya, mini album Silver memuat lima lagu baru Gigi, yang dua di antaranya tidak dikasih lirik. Di dua nomor ini, Armand hanya bergumam (humming) dengan iringan musik dari Budjana, Thomas, dan Hendy. Nantinya, siapapun bisa menulis lirik untuk dua lagu tersebut. Jika liriknya cocok, akan dijadikan lagu Gigi.
"Konsep humming ini sengaja kami buat untuk memberi tantangan kepada pendengar. Mereka dibebaskan untuk membuat lirik berdasarkan melodi yang sudah ada. Cara ini untuk membangun interaksi Gigi dengan pendengar," ungkap Armand di The Fifth, Jalan Kemang Raya, Jakarta.
Box set ekslusif 25 tahun Gigi ini merupakan ide bersama Gigi yang diwakili tim manajemen Gigi dan PT Beli Album Fisik milik Erix dari Endank Soekamti. Armand menyebutkan, hampir semua band yang bertahan selama puluhan tahun pasti pernah merilis sesuatu yang kreatif dan sifatnya personal. Untuk itulah, di tahun ke-25 ini mereka memutuskan untuk merilis box set ekslusif.
"Menurut Erix, penggemar itu terbagi tiga. Pertama yang die hard, kedua di tengah-tengah, dan ketiga, penggemar yang selewat. Box set ini menyasar ke tipe penggemar yang die hard. Walaupun harganya enggak murah, tapi pasti ada yang beli. Tujuannya memang bukan produk massal, tapi kalau banyak yang pesan, alhamdulillah," ungkap Armand.
Alasan lain Gigi merilis box set ekslusif adalah untuk merilis karya dalam bentuk fisik. Inilah sebabnya mereka membuat mini album Silver dalam format kaset. Bagi Gigi, merilis karya dalam bentuk fisik menjadi tantangan di tengah gempuran format musik digital.
"Kami ingin mengingatkan ke generasi sekarang, kalau di industri musik ada era fisik. Kebetulan sekarang kaset juga sedang booming lagi. Jadi, kami memilih untuk kembali ke kaset," kata Budjana.Hendy menambahkan, sebagai band, Gigi telah banyak melahirkan karya. Pada hari jadi ke-15 mereka pernah merilis buku. Di tahun ini, mereka memutuskan merilis box set dan fokus ke kisah para personel. Hal ini dimaksudkan untuk mendekatkan awak Gigi lebih personal ke pendengar.
Sementara itu, bagi Thomas, mini album Silver dan box set menjadi pengingat untuk Gigi. Mereka harus terus bersyukur dan terus berkarya karena Tuhan sudah memberi kesempatan untuk Gigi terus berjalan."Kami adalah band yang lahir di era 1990-an. Kami merasakan era kaset sampai sekarang era digital. Di tahun ke-25 ini kami ingin kembali merasakan karya analog, makanya kami bikin kaset," ujar Thomas.
Konsep box set dan minialbum Silver dikerjakan sekitar satu bulan. Dari mini album itu, Gigi menawarkan lagu Pesan yang Singkat sebagai single. Lirik lagu ini ditulis Thomas, sedangkan aransemennya dikerjakan Gigi.Â 
"Semoga Gigi bisa terus ada, sampai kami tidak bisa berkarya lagi," ujar Armand yang diamini personel lain.***

Celebrate 25th Anniversary, Tooth Release Box Set
03 Nov 2019, 05:07 by Windy Eka Pramudya
TO celebrate the 25th anniversary, Gigi presents a special gift for Gigikita, as fans of Gigi, on Saturday, November 2, 2019. Gigi launched an exclusive box set as a form of celebration of their birthdays. This box set consisting of four pieces of puzzle represents the story of four Gigi personnel, namely Armand Maulana (vocals), Dewa Budjana (guitar), Gusti Hendy (drums), and Thomas Ramdhan (bass).
This exclusive box set contains memorabilia of the Dental personnel. Each box set contains a T-shirt, a documentary DVD that tells about the daily lives of personnel in the title A Day With, a diary written by the personnel, and a Gigikita member card edition of each personnel. In addition to Armand et al's memorabilia, the box set also contained Gigi's latest mini album titled Silver in cassette format, Gigi's 25-year member card, Gigi's 10-year photo postcard and Gigi's certificate of ownership of the box set.
Uniquely, the Silver mini album contained five new Gigi songs, two of which were not given lyrics. In these two numbers, Armand only murmurs (humming) with musical accompaniment from Budjana, Thomas, and Hendy. Later, anyone can write lyrics for the two songs. If the lyrics match, it will become the song Gigi.
"We deliberately created this humming concept to challenge listeners. They were freed to compose lyrics based on existing melodies. This method is to build the interaction of Gigi with listeners," said Armand at The Fifth, Jalan Kemang Raya, Jakarta.
This exclusive 25-year box set Gigi is an idea shared by Gigi, represented by Gigi's management team and Erix's PT Beli Physical Album from Endank Soekamti. Armand said, almost all bands that survived for decades must have released something creative and personal. For this reason, in this 25th year they decided to release an exclusive box set.
"According to Erix, the fans are divided into three. First the die hard, second in the middle, and third, the passing fans. This box set targets the die hard fans. Even though the price is not cheap, there must be someone who buys it. it is not a mass product, but if many order, thank God, "said Armand.
Another reason that Gigi released an exclusive box set is to release the work in physical form. This is why they made the Silver mini album in cassette format. For Gigi, releasing works in physical form becomes a challenge amid the onslaught of digital music formats.
"We want to remind the current generation, that in the music industry there is a physical era. Incidentally now the cassette is also booming again. So, we chose to return to the cassette," said Budjana. Hendy added, as a band, Gigi has produced many works. On the 15th anniversary they had released a book. This year, they decided to release a box set and focus on the story of the personnel. This is intended to bring the Gigi crew closer to the listener.
Meanwhile, for Thomas, Silver's mini album and box set is a reminder for Gigi. They must continue to be grateful and continue to work because God has given the opportunity for Gigi to keep going. "We are a band born in the 1990s. We feel the cassette era until now the digital era. In this 25th year we want to re-feel analog works "That's why we make tapes," said Thomas.
The concept of the Silver box set and mini album is done in about a month. From the mini album, Gigi offers Short Message songs as singles. The lyrics of this song are written by Thomas, while the arrangement is done by Gigi.
"Hopefully Gigi can continue to exist, until we cannot work anymore," said Armand who was agreed by other personnel. ***
